QuestData.Title: Candle to the Grave
QuestData.Description:
These kobolds are taking advantage of the attacks against the Skyhorn tribe. They disturb our graves and steal anything they can get their paws on.
I can do nothing to stop them! Please rid this sacred burial ground of the kobold.
QuestData.CompletionText: We once thought they were nothing but overgrown rats, but they do have some intelligence.
QuestData.RewardText: Some of them seem to be digging less enthusiastically, at the very least.
